question: I'm asking you.
answer: What I'm saying is when you misrepresent the nature of your company, when you artificially inflate earnings, when you improperly hide losses, when you do things like this to cause your stock price to go up so you can sell your stock to cause yourself to make earning targets, that otherwise you'd be unable to make so you get high salaries and bonuses, that is stealing.
